text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Next, let's organize support cards that
will help you train your horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Each card has its own effects, such as
the appearance of the characters in the
support card during training or giving
you skills!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Please keep in mind you can't use 
support cards of the same horsegirl 
that you're training!
